Question: Moldintel Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Moldintel Co., Ltd.

Smart Injection Manufacturing Solution

- Cloud-based molding condition guidance and optimizer
- Virtual master operator for factory productability
- Digitized production know-how
- Rule-based smart injection molding solution
- Cost-saving from mold trial to mass production
- IoT technology for fully smart automatic injection molding process
- Start-up company focused on advanced manufacturing technologies
- Cross-brand injection molding intelligent solutions
- Winner of 2020 IAIC Best Startup Company

For further information, visit https://www.moldintel.com/#/
